definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Being after power and being tame is a special outcome of the Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 對權力的追求與馴順是中國傳統文化的特殊產物。

sentences.english: Harriet kissed her hand in silent and submissive gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 哈麗特一聲不吭，帶着馴順的感激之情吻了吻她的手。

sentences.english: He is a gentle horse that never cast his rider.
sentences.chinese: 馴順的馬毫不會把騎手甩倒。

sentences.english: As you know, I am a very kind person.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，我是個很馴順的人。

sentences.english: Make dragon tiger surrender tame and docile.
